sqlMap.select:
SELECT TUIKA_FG, TK_KOJO, TK_UKE, TK_SEBAN, TK_HIN, EDABAN, SEBAN, SYUYO_SU, TP_NOBAN, SIJI_SU,(SIJI_SU - HIKI_SU) FUSOKU_SU, UCHI_ZAN_SU, ORG_NOU_YMD, ORG_BIN_NO, ORG_SIJI_SU, ORG_EDABAN, HIKI_SU, HIKI_FG, UCHI_FG
, JUNBI_SU FROM TB_NOUHIN_JO
, SYUKA_SU AS JUNBI_SU FROM TB_NOUNYU_RI
WHERE SIIRE = #siire# AND NOU_YMD = #nou_ymd# AND RTRIM(RG) = RTRIM(#rg#) AND BIN_NO = #bin_no# AND B_KYOTEN = #b_kyoten# ORDER BY TK_KOJO, TK_UKE, TK_SEBAN, EDABAN
